section.p: The Postprocedure Diagnosis Section records the diagnosis or diagnoses discovered or confirmed during the procedure. Often it is the same as the preprocedure diagnosis or indication.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8167, CONF:1198-10438, CONF:1198-32550 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Postprocedure Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15403)/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15404, CONF:1198-30862)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8762, CONF:1198-15503)
Conforms to Postprocedure Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Postprocedure Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15403)/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15404, CONF:1198-30862)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8170, R2.1=CONF:1198-8170)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8171, R2.1=CONF:1198-8171)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8762, CONF:1198-15503)
Conforms to Postprocedure Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.51:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8167, CONF:10438 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36"
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15403)/@code="59769-0" Postprocedure Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15404)
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8170, R2.1=CONF:1198-8170)
Consol Postprocedure Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8171, R2.1=CONF:1198-8171)
